channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
Hello..
i've got some problems with loading the server. I played moparscape several years ago...
What the problem is?
I choosed a server witch i like to play on, then i opened it. Then the original loading page is comming up. Java asks me to agree, i accept it.
But then when the login page should come up, a big white screen comes up. What is the problem here?
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/9blm44.png[/img] Sorry for my bad english, i am dutch.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @twobrosplay twobrosplay
item.description:
@twobrosplay wrote:

(Try compileing it with your correct .java \ .javac)

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @jaimy527 jaimy527
item.description:
@jaimy527 wrote:

@Bear Gryllz: Yes i had it up to date, and i reinstalled it so i am sure now.

@pkonlynoob: up to date and where can change those settings ?

@Ashi: where can i find the security settings ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

You need to change your security settings to run the app.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @pkonlynoob pkonlynoob
item.description:
@pkonlynoob wrote:

Check that your java is up to date.
And if you have the newest version of java u have to allow that otherwise java will block it

Read full topic

item.description:
@Bear_Gryllz wrote:
